message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our product to you. It is an exceptional opportunity that we believe would significantly enhance your business operations. We are confident that its value to you surpasses its price. Our initial offer is $1,200,000 for the product.

Alice, I appreciate your offer. While the product is enticing, your initial price is above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1,050,000 for it. This is a fair price that reflects the value I place on the product, and I believe it is a win-win scenario for both of us.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to meet halfway. However, after careful consideration, I am unable to accept your counteroffer at this time. We believe in valuing our products based on their true worth and the benefits they provide. Our revised offer remains at $1,200,000 for the product.
